anya-e0803n12:3: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni, anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e0803n12:7: Tesu kānici rūpehi, sesāññehi ca yujjare;
anya-e0803n12:8: Kānici pana saheva, etesaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ idaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:9: Etasmā lakkhaṇā muttaṁ, na padaṁ sabbanāmikaṁ;
anya-e0803n12:11_0: Sabbanāmāni nāma – sabba katara katama ubhaya itaraañña aññatara aññatama pubba para
anya-e0803n12:11_1: apara dakkhiṇa uttara adharayata eta ima amukiṁ eka ubha dviti catu tumha amha iccetāni sattavīsa.
anya-e0803n12:12_0: Etesu sabbasaddo sakalattho, so ca sabbasabbādivasena ñeyyo. Katara katamasaddā pucchanatthā.
anya-e0803n12:12_1: Ubhayasaddo dviavayavasamudāyavacano. Itarasaddo vuttapaṭiyogīvacano. Aññasaddo adhigatāparavacano.
anya-e0803n12:12_2: Aññatara aññatamasaddā aniyamatthā. Pubbādayo uttarapariyantā disākālādivavatthāvacanā.
anya-e0803n12:12_3: Tathā hi pubbaparā para dakkhiṇuttarasaddā pulliṅgatte yathārahaṁ kāladesādivacanā,
anya-e0803n12:12_4: itthiliṅgatte disādivacanā, napuṁsakaliṅgatte ṭhānādivacanā. Adharasaddopi heṭṭhimatthavācako
anya-e0803n12:12_5: vavatthāvacanoyeva, so ca tiliṅgo ‘‘adharo patto. Adharā araṇī, adharaṁ bhājana’’miti,
anya-e0803n12:12_6: yaṁsaddo aniyamattho. Taṁsaddo parammukhāvacano. Etasaddo samīpavacano. Imasaddo
anya-e0803n12:12_7: accantasamīpavacano. Amusaddo dūravacano. Kiṁsaddo pucchanattho. Ekasaddo saṅkhādivacano. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0803n12:13_0: Ekasaddo aññatthaseṭṭhaasahāyasaṅkhādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa ‘‘sassato attā ca loko
anya-e0803n12:13_1: ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññanti, ittheke abhivadantī’’tiādīsu aññatthe dissati.
anya-e0803n12:13_3: kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā’’tiādīsu saṅkhāyanti.
anya-e0803n12:14_0: Yatthesa saṅkhāvacano, tatthekavacanantova. Ubhasaddo dvisaddapariyāyo. Dviticatusaddā
anya-e0803n12:14_1: saṅkhāvacanā, sabbakālaṁ bahuvacanantāva. Tumhasaddo yena katheti, tasmiṁ vattabbavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:16_0: Sabbo, sabbe. Sabbaṁ, sabbe. Sabbena, sabbehi, sabbebhi. Sabbassa, sabbesaṁ, sabbesānaṁ.

anya-e0803n12:17_1: ca nayena sabbāni pulliṅganāmehi saddhiṁ yojetabbāni. Yāni pana yamakamahātherena

anya-e0803n12:23_1: itthiliṅgasabbanāmāni sabbehi itthiliṅgehi saddhiṁ yojetabbāni. Ettha ca ‘‘sabbassā’’ti
anya-e0803n12:23_3: saddhi’’nti karaṇappayogādidassanato. Sabbassā kaññāya kataṁ. Sabbassā kaññāya deti.
anya-e0803n12:23_4: Ayaṁ kaññā sabbassā kaññāya hīnā virūpā. Ayaṁ kaññā sabbassā kaññāya uttamā abhirūpā.
anya-e0803n12:23_5: Sabbassā kaññāya apeti, sabbassā kaññāya dhanaṁ. Sabbassā kaññāya patiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:24_0: Sabbaṁ, sabbāni. Sabbaṁ, sabbāni. Sabbena, sabbehi, sabbebhi. Sabbassa, sabbesaṁ,

anya-e0803n12:24_2: Sabbasmiṁ, sabbamhi, sabbesu. Bho sabba, bhavanto sabbāni. Napuṁsakaliṅgatte nāmikapadamālā.

anya-e0803n12:25_1: napuṁsakaliṅgasabbanāmāni sabbehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi saddhiṁ yojetabbāni. Evaṁ sabbasaddassa
anya-e0803n12:26_0: Idānissa parapadena saddhiṁ samāso veditabbo ‘‘sabbasādhāraṇo sabbaverī’’iti. Tattha
anya-e0803n12:26_1: sabbesaṁ sādhāraṇo sabbasādhāraṇo. Sabbesaṁ verī, sabbe vā verino yassa soyaṁ sabbaverīti
anya-e0803n12:26_2: samāsaviggaho. Yathā pana sabbasaddassa padamālā liṅgattayavasena yojitā, evaṁ katarasaddādīnampi
anya-e0803n12:28_0: Kataro, katare. Kataraṁ…pe… bho katara, bhavanto katare. Katamo, katame. Itaro, itare.

anya-e0803n12:30_0: Kataraṁ, katarāni. Kataraṁ…pe… bho katara, bhavanto katarāni. Katamaṁ. Ubhayaṁ. Itaraṁ.
anya-e0803n12:30_1: Aññaṁ. Aññataraṁ. Aññatamaṁ. Pubbaṁ. Paraṁ. Aparaṁ. Dakkhiṇaṁ. Uttaraṁ. Adharaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:30_2: adharāni. Adharaṁ…pe… bho adhara, bhavanto adharānīti.
anya-e0803n12:31_0: Idāni punnapuṁsakaliṅgānaṁ parasaddādīnaṁ rūpantaraniddeso vuccati. Kaccāyanasmiñhi
anya-e0803n12:31_1: ‘‘purisā’’ti viya ‘‘parā’’ti paṭhamābahuvacanaṁ dissati. Evarūpo nayo aparasabbakatarādīsu
anya-e0803n12:31_2: aññatamapariyosānesu navasu appasiddho, labbhamāno pubbadakkhiṇuttarādharesu catūsu
anya-e0803n12:31_4: kaccāyane ca ‘‘pare’’ti sattamīekavacanaṁ dissati. Evarūpo nayo sabba aññasaddesu
anya-e0803n12:31_5: appasiddho, labbhamāno katarakatamādīsu sesesu adharapariyosānesu dvādasasu labbheyya.
anya-e0803n12:31_6: Tathā ‘‘purisā’’ti viya sabbā katarā iccādi pañcamīekavacananayo pāḷiādīsu appasiddho.
anya-e0803n12:31_7: Evaṁ santepi ayaṁ nayo punappunaṁ upaparikkhitvā yutto ce, gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n12:33_0: Katarā, katarā, katarāyo. Kataraṁ…pe… bhoti katare, bhotiyo katarā, katarāyo. Katamā.
anya-e0803n12:33_1: Ubhayā. Itarā. Aññatarā. Aññatamā. Pubbā. Parā. Aparā. Dakkhiṇā. Uttarā. Adharā,
anya-e0803n12:33_2: adharā, adharāyo. Adharaṁ…pe… bhoti adhare, bhotiyo adharā, adharāyoti.
anya-e0803n12:34_0: Yasmā panetesu itara añña aññatara aññatamānaṁ pāḷiyādīsu ‘‘itarissā’’tiādidassanato
anya-e0803n12:34_1: koci bhedo vattabbo , tasmā catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ ekavacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘itarissā, itarāya,
anya-e0803n12:34_2: aññissā, aññāya. Aññatarissā, aññatarāya, aññatamissā, aññatamāyā’’ti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:34_3: Tathā tatiyāpañcamīnamekavacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘tassā kumārikāya saddhiṁ. Kassāhaṁ kena hāyāmī’’ti
anya-e0803n12:34_5: itarāya, itarāyaṁ, aññissā, aññissaṁ, aññāya, aññāyaṁ, aññatarissā, aññatarissaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:34_6: aññatarāya, aññatarāyaṁ, aññatamissā, aññatamissaṁ, aññatamāya, aññatamāya’’nti yojetabbaṁ
anya-e0803n12:34_7: ‘‘aññataro bhikkhu aññatarissā itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto hotī’’ti pāḷidassanato.
anya-e0803n12:35_0: Tatra sabbasaddo sabbasabbaṁ, padesasabbaṁ, āyatanasabbaṁ, sakkāyasabbanti catūsu
anya-e0803n12:35_1: visayesu diṭṭhappayogo. Tathā hesa ‘‘sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato
anya-e0803n12:35_2: ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī’’tiādīsu sabbasabbasmiṁ āgato. ‘‘Sabbesaṁ vo sāriputtā
anya-e0803n12:35_3: subhāsitaṁ pariyāyenā’’tiādīsu padesasabbasmiṁ. ‘‘Sabbaṁ vo bhikkhave desessāmi,
anya-e0803n12:35_4: taṁ suṇātha sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmi…pe… katamañca bhikkhave sabbaṁ cakkhuñceva
anya-e0803n12:35_5: rūpā ca…pe… mano ceva dhammā cā’’ti ettha āyatanasabbasmiṁ. ‘‘Sabbaṁ sabbato sañjānātī’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n12:35_6: sakkāyasabbasmiṁ. Tattha sabbasabbasmiṁ āgato nippadeso, itaresu tīsu sappadesoti
anya-e0803n12:38_0: Katara katamasaddesu katarasaddo appesu ekaṁ vā dve vā tīṇi vā bhiyyo vā appamupādāya
anya-e0803n12:38_1: vattati. Katamasaddo bahūsu ekaṁ vā dve vā tīṇi vā bahuṁ vā upādāya vattati. Katarasaddo
anya-e0803n12:38_2: hi appavisayo, katamasaddo bahuvisayo. Tatrime payogā ‘‘katarena maggena gantabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:38_3: Samuddo kataro ayaṁ. Katamo tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti. Katame dhammā kusalā. Disā
anya-e0803n12:38_4: catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṁ adho dasa disatā, imāyo, katamaṁ disaṁ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā’’.
anya-e0803n12:38_5: Iccevamādayo bhavanti. Ubhayo. Ubhayaṁ. Ubhayo. Ubhayena. Sesaṁ pulliṅge sabbasaddasamaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:38_6: Ubhayo janā tiṭṭhanti. Ubhayo jane passati. Yathā ubho puttā. Ubho putteti. ‘‘Ubhayo’’ti
anya-e0803n12:38_7: hi padaṁ ‘‘ubho’’ti padamiva bahuvacanantabhāvena pasiddhaṁ, na tvekavacanantabhāvena. Ettha hi –
anya-e0803n12:41_0: ‘‘Ubhayo te pitābhātaro’’ti tadatthasādhakāni nidassanapadāni veditabbāni. Yadā panāyasmanto
anya-e0803n12:41_1: ‘‘ubhayo’’ti ekavacanantaṁ passeyyātha, tadā sādhukaṁ manasi karotha. Ko hi samattho
anya-e0803n12:41_2: anantanayapaṭimaṇḍite sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake jinasāsane niravasesato nayaṁ daṭṭhuṁ
anya-e0803n12:45_0: Idāni asabbanāmesu saṅgaho vuccate – tattha aññasaddo tāva yadā bālavācako, tadā
anya-e0803n12:45_1: sabbanāmaṁ nāma na hoti. Asabbanāmattā ca sabbathāpi purisa kaññā cittanayeneva yojetabbo.
anya-e0803n12:45_2: Tathā hi na jānātīti añño, bālo puriso. Na jānātīti aññā, bālā itthī. Na jānātīti
anya-e0803n12:45_3: aññaṁ, bālaṁ kulanti vacanattho. Evaṁ viditvā pulliṅgaṭṭhāne ‘‘añño, aññā. Aññaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:45_4: aññe’’tiādinā purisanayeneva nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne ‘‘aññā, aññā,
anya-e0803n12:45_5: aññāyo’’tiādinā kaññānayeneva, napuṁsakaliṅgaṭṭhāne ‘‘aññaṁ, aññānī’’tiādinā cittanayeneva yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:46_0: Imasmiñhi atthavisese bālajane vattukāmena ‘‘aññā janā’’ti avatvā ‘‘aññe janā’’ti
anya-e0803n12:46_1: vutte tassa taṁ vacanaṁ adhippetatthaṁ na sādheti aññathā atthassa gahetabbattā.
anya-e0803n12:46_2: Tathā ‘‘aññānaṁ janāna’’nti avatvā ‘‘aññesaṁ janānaṁ, aññesānaṁ janāna’’nti vā vutte
anya-e0803n12:46_3: tassa taṁ vacanaṁ adhippetatthaṁ na sādheti. Tathā ‘‘aññānaṁ itthīna’’nti avatvā
anya-e0803n12:46_4: ‘‘aññāsaṁ itthīna’’nti vuttepi, ‘‘aññānaṁ kulāna’’nti avatvā ‘‘aññesaṁ kulānaṁ, aññesānaṁ
anya-e0803n12:46_5: kulāna’’nti vā vuttepi. Sabbanāmikavasena pana adhigatāparavacanicchāyaṁ ‘‘aññe janā’’tiādinā
anya-e0803n12:46_6: vattabbaṁ, na ‘‘aññā janā’’tiādinā. Tathā hi ‘‘aññā janā’’tiādinā vuttavacanaṁ adhippetatthaṁ
anya-e0803n12:46_7: na sādheti aññathā atthassa gahetabbattā. Iti yattha ‘‘aññā janā’’tiādivacanaṁ upapajjati,
anya-e0803n12:46_8: ‘‘aññe janā’’tiādivacanaṁ nupapajjati, yattha pana ‘‘aññe janā’’tiādivacanaṁ upapajjati,
anya-e0803n12:46_9: ‘‘aññā janā’’tiādivacanaṁ nupapajjati. Yā etasmiṁ atthavisese sallakkhaṇā paññā,
anya-e0803n12:46_10: ayaṁ nītiyā maggo yuttāyuttivicāraṇe hetuttā, lokasmiñhi yuttāyuttivicāraṇā nītīti
anya-e0803n12:46_11: vuttā. Sā ca vinā paññāya na sijjhati. Evaṁ aññasaddo asabbanāmikopi bhavati.
anya-e0803n12:47_0: Pubba dakkhiṇuttara parasaddesu pubbasaddo yattha padhānavācako, yattha ca ‘‘semhaṁ
anya-e0803n12:47_1: pubbo’’tiādīsu lohitakopajavācako, tattha asabbanāmiko. Paṭhamatthe tiliṅgo, dutiyatthe
anya-e0803n12:47_2: ekaliṅgo. Uttamatthavācako pana uttarasaddo ca parasaddo ca asabbanāmiko tiliṅgoyeva.
anya-e0803n12:47_3: Tathā ‘‘dakkhiṇassā vahantima’’nti ettha viya susikkhitatthacaturatthavācako dakkhiṇasaddo.
anya-e0803n12:47_4: ‘‘Petānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ dajjā’’tiādīsu pana deyyadhammavācako dakkhiṇāsaddo niyogā itthiliṅgo
anya-e0803n12:47_5: asabbanāmikoyeva. Evaṁ añña pubba dakkhiṇuttara parasaddā asabbanāmikāpi santīti
anya-e0803n12:48_0: Idāni katarasaddādīnaṁ parapadena saddhiṁ samāso nīyate ‘‘kataragāmavāsī katamagāmavāsī.
anya-e0803n12:48_1: Ubhayagāmavāsino, itaragāmavāsī aññataragāmavāsī, pubbadisā, parajano, dakkhiṇadisā,
anya-e0803n12:48_2: uttaradisā, adharapatto’’ti. Tatra ‘‘kataro gāmo kataragāmo, katamo gāmo katamagāmo,
anya-e0803n12:48_3: ubhayo gāmā ubhayagāmā’’tiādinā yathārahaṁ samāsaviggaho, katarasaddassa pana katamasaddena
anya-e0803n12:48_4: saddhiṁ samāsaṁ icchanti dvidhā ca rūpāni garū ‘‘kataro ca katamo ca katarakatame
anya-e0803n12:48_5: katarakatamā vā’’ti . Tasmā sabbanāmikanayena suddhanāmikesu purisanayena ca katara
anya-e0803n12:48_7: katarakatamesānaṁ, katarakatamāna’’nti tīṇi rūpāni siyuṁ ‘‘katarā ca katamā ca katarakatamā’’ti
anya-e0803n12:48_8: evaṁ itthiliṅgavasena katasamāse pana sabbanāmikanayena, suddhanāmikesu kaññānayena
anya-e0803n12:48_9: ca yojetabbā. ‘‘Katarañca katamañca katarakatamānī’’ti evaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n12:48_10: katasamāse sabbanāmikanayena, suddhanāmikesu cittanayena ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:49_0: Ayaṁ panettha visesopi veditabbo – pubbāparādisaddā dvandasamāsādividhiṁ patvā sehi
anya-e0803n12:49_1: rūpehi rūpavanto na honti, taṁ yathā? Pubbāparā, adharuttarā, māsapubbā purisā, diṭṭhapubbā
anya-e0803n12:49_2: purisā, tathāgataṁ diṭṭhapubbā sāvakā, idaṁ pulliṅgatte paṭhamābahuvacanarūpaṁ. Etthekāro
anya-e0803n12:49_3: ādesabhūto na dissati. Pubbāparānaṁ adharuttarānaṁ, māsapubbānaṁ purisānaṁ, idaṁ
anya-e0803n12:49_4: pulliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ bahuvacanarūpaṁ. Ettha saṁ sānamiccete ādesabhūtā
anya-e0803n12:49_5: na dissanti. Tathāgataṁ diṭṭhapubbānaṁ sāvakānaṁ, tathāgataṁ diṭṭhapubbānaṁ sāvikānaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:49_6: kulānaṁ vā, idaṁ tiliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ bahuvacanarūpaṁ. Etthāpi saṁ sānamiccete
anya-e0803n12:49_7: ādesabhūtā na dissanti. Māsapubbāyaṁ māsapubbāya, piyapubbāyaṁ piyapubbāya, idamitthiliṅgatte
anya-e0803n12:49_8: sattamīcatutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ ekavacanarūpaṁ. Etthādesabhūtā saṁ sā na dissanti. Māsapubbānaṁ
anya-e0803n12:49_10: Ettha panādesabhūto samicceso na dissati. Aññānipi yathāsambhavaṁ yojetabbāni, pubbāparādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n12:51_0: Yo, ye. Yaṁ, ye. Yena, yehi, yebhi. Yassa, yesaṁ, yesānaṁ. Yasmā, yamhā, yehi, yebhi.

anya-e0803n12:232_0: Tattha hi ahaṁ dīpo etesanti maṁdīpā, ahaṁ leṇaṁ etesanti maṁleṇā, evaṁ maṁsaraṇā.
anya-e0803n12:232_1: Tumhena yogo tayyogo, tumhasaddena yogo iccevattho. Amhena yogo mayyogo, amhasaddena
anya-e0803n12:232_2: yogo iccevattho. Tava mukhaṁ tvaṁmukhaṁ. Bahuvacanavasenapi nibbacanīyaṁ ‘‘tumhākaṁ
anya-e0803n12:232_4: kābyādāse ca ‘‘tvaṁmukha’’nti dassanato tvaṁvaṇṇo, tvaṁsaro, maṁmukhaṁ, maṁvaṇṇo,
anya-e0803n12:232_5: maṁsaroādīni gahetabbāni. Tattha tvaṁ dīpo etesanti tvaṁdīpā, tumhe vā dīpā etesanti
anya-e0803n12:232_6: tvaṁdīpā, tava vaṇṇo tvaṁvaṇṇo. Mama mukhaṁ maṁmukhaṁ, amhākaṁ vā mukhaṁ maṁmukhanti
anya-e0803n12:232_7: nibbacanāni. Esa nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu.
anya-e0803n12:235_0: Etthāha ‘‘kiṁ ettakameva tumhaamhasaddānaṁ rūpaṁ, udāhu aññampi atthī’’ti? Atthi
anya-e0803n12:235_1: ‘‘te me’’ iccādīni. Yadi evaṁ kasmā padamālā visuṁ na vuttāti? Avacane kāraṇamatthi. Atridaṁ kāraṇaṁ –
anya-e0803n12:236: ‘‘Te me vo no’’ti rūpāni, parāni padato yato;
anya-e0803n12:237: Tato nāmikapantīsu, na tu vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e0803n12:238_0: Ettha ca mayaṁ me vo nosaddānamatthuddhāro vuccate – tesaddassa pana vuttova. Yasmā
anya-e0803n12:238_1: aṭṭhakathācariyā mayaṁsaddaṭṭhānepi mayāsaddo, mayāsaddaṭṭhānepi ca mayaṁsaddo icceva
anya-e0803n12:238_2: vadanti, tasmā mayampi tatheva vadāma. Mayaṁsaddo ‘‘anuññātapaṭiññātā, tevijjāmayamasmubho’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n12:238_3: asmadatthe āgato . ‘‘Mayaṁ nissāya hemāya, jātā mandosisūpagā’’ti ettha paññattiyaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:238_4: ‘‘Manomayā pītibhakkhā sayaṁpabhā’’tiādīsu nibbattiatthe. Bāhirena paccayena vinā
anya-e0803n12:238_5: manasāva nibbattāti manomayā. ‘‘Yaṁnūnāhaṁ sabbamattikāmayaṁ kuṭikaṁ kareyya’’ntiādīsu
anya-e0803n12:238_7: uḷāra’’nti ettha vikāratthe padapūraṇamatte vā daṭṭhabbo. Yadā hi suvaṇṇameva sovaṇṇanti
anya-e0803n12:238_8: ayamattho, tadā suvaṇṇassa vikāro sovaṇṇamayanti vikāratthe mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:238_9: Nibbattiatthotipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati. Yadā pana suvaṇṇena nibbattaṁ sovaṇṇanti ayamattho,
anya-e0803n12:238_10: tadā sovaṇṇameva sovaṇṇamayanti padapūraṇamatte mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:239_0: Mesaddo ‘‘kicchena me adhigataṁ, halaṁ dāni pakāsitu’’ntiādīsu karaṇe āgato. Mayāti
anya-e0803n12:239_1: attho. ‘‘Tassa me bhante bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetū’’tiādīsu sampadāne, mayhanti
anya-e0803n12:239_2: atthoti vadanti. ‘‘Pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva
anya-e0803n12:239_3: sato’’tiādīsu sāmiatthe, mamāti atthoti ca vadanti. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n12:240: Karaṇe sampadāne ca, sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e0803n12:242_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā aṭṭhakathācariyehi kate te mesaddānamatthavivaraṇe vinicchayaṁ
anya-e0803n12:242_1: brūma tesamadhippāyappakāsanavasena sotūnaṁ saṁsayasamugghāṭanatthaṁ. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā
anya-e0803n12:242_2: temesaddānaṁ sampadānatthavasena ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇesuṁ, sāmiatthavasena
anya-e0803n12:242_3: pana ‘‘tava mamā’’ti. Evaṁ yvāyaṁ tehi asaṅkarato niyamo dassito, so sāṭṭhakathe
anya-e0803n12:242_4: tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā. Tathā hi temesaddatthavācakā tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddā
anya-e0803n12:242_5: tava mamasaddā ca sampadānasāmiatthesu aniyamato pavattanti.
anya-e0803n12:243_0: Tatrime payogā – idaṁ tuyhaṁ dadāmi. Tuyhaṁ vikappemi. Tuyhaṁ maṁsena medena, matthakena
anya-e0803n12:243_1: ca brāhmaṇa, āhutiṁ paggahessāmi. Esa hi tuyhaṁ pitā narasīho. Tuyhaṁ pana mātā kahanti.
anya-e0803n12:243_2: Mayhameva dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, na aññesaṁ, mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, na aññesaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:243_3: Na mayhaṁ bhariyā esā. Assamo sukato mayhaṁ. Sabbaññutaṁ piyaṁ mayhaṁ. Tāta mayhaṁ
anya-e0803n12:243_4: mātu mukhaṁ aññādisaṁ, tumhākaṁ aññādisaṁ. Mayhaṁ sāmiko idāni marissati. Tava dīyate,
anya-e0803n12:243_5: tava silāghate, mama silāghate, pabbajjā mama ruccati. Tava putto. Ubho mātāpitā
anya-e0803n12:244_1: sabbattha anaññaṁ, tatiyāpañcamīnaṁ bahuvacanañcā’’ti . Yadi evaṁ aṭṭhakathācariyā
anya-e0803n12:244_2: ‘‘namo te purisājañña. Namo te buddha vīratthū’tiādīsu tuyhaṁsaddassa vasena sampadāne,
anya-e0803n12:244_3: tuyhanti hi attho. ‘Kinte vataṁ kiṁ pana brahmacariya’ntiādīsu sāmiatthe, tavāti
anya-e0803n12:244_5: na passiṁsū’’tipi āpajjantīti? Yuttaṁyeva te saṁvaṇṇayiṁsu, passitabbañca passiṁsu.
anya-e0803n12:244_6: Tathā hi te ‘‘saddasatthampi ekadesato sāsanānukūlaṁ hotī’’ti paresamanukampāya saddasatthato
anya-e0803n12:244_7: nayaṁ gahetvā sampadānatthavasena te mesaddānaṁ ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇayiṁsu,
anya-e0803n12:244_8: sāmiatthavasena pana ‘‘tava mamā’’ti. Saddasatthe hi catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sabbathā
anya-e0803n12:244_9: visadisāni, sāsane pana sadisāni. Tasmā sāsane sāmaññena pavattāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni
anya-e0803n12:244_10: saddasatthe visesena pavattehi catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpehi samānagatikāni katvā paresamanukampāya
anya-e0803n12:244_11: sampadānatthe tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddānaṁ pavattiniyamo, sāmiatthe ca tava mamasaddānaṁ
anya-e0803n12:244_12: pavattiniyamo dassito. Yasmā pana paresamanukampāya ayaṁ niyamo, tasmā karuṇāyevāyaṁparādho,
anya-e0803n12:244_13: na aṭṭhakathācariyānaṁ. Tāya eva hi tehi evaṁ saṁvaṇṇanā katāti.
anya-e0803n12:245_0: Keci panettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ – nanu ca bho aṭṭhakathācariyehi saddanayaṁ nissāya te
anya-e0803n12:245_1: mesaddānaṁ sāmiatthe vattamānānaṁ ‘‘tava mamā’’ti atthavacanena ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena
anya-e0803n12:245_2: medena, na mayhaṁ bhariyā esā’’tiādīsu sāmivisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti
anya-e0803n12:245_3: sakkā vattuṁ, tathā saddanayaññeva nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sampadānatthe vattamānānaṁ
anya-e0803n12:245_4: ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthavacanena ‘‘bhattaṁ tava na ruccati. Pabbajjā mama ruccatī’’tiādīsupi
anya-e0803n12:245_5: sampadānavisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattunti? Na sakkā, gāthāsu
anya-e0803n12:245_6: viya cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhānepi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ aniyamena dvīsu atthesu
anya-e0803n12:245_7: pavattanato. Na hi īdise ṭhāne gāthāyaṁ vā cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne vā vibhattivipallāso
anya-e0803n12:245_8: icchitabbo. ‘‘Tassa rajjassahaṁ bhīto. Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmī’’tiādīsuyeva
anya-e0803n12:246_0: Yadi saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā’’tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo
anya-e0803n12:246_1: siyā, ‘‘brāhmaṇassa piyaputtadānaṁ adāsi. Brāhmaṇassa pitā adāsī’’tiādīsupi saddanayaṁ
anya-e0803n12:246_3: satthe visuṁ vacanato. Evañca sati ko dosoti ce? Attheva doso, yasmā dānayoge vā
anya-e0803n12:246_4: namoyoge vā āyādesasahitāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane
anya-e0803n12:246_6: yadidaṁ avijjamānaggahaṇaṁ. Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu vibhattivipallāsakaraṇaṁ sāvajjaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:246_7: tasmā ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā’’tiādīsupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:247_0: Catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni hi anaññāni dissanti ‘‘purisassa adāsi, purisassa dhanaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ
anya-e0803n12:247_1: adāsi, brāhmaṇānaṁ santaka’’nti. Tathā hi pāvacane sa naṁsaddā sampadānasāmiatthesu
anya-e0803n12:247_2: sāmaññena pavattanti, tappavatti ‘‘aggassa dātā medhāvī’’tiādīhi payogehi dīpetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:247_3: ‘‘Aggassa dātā medhāvī’’ti ettha hi ‘‘aggassā’’ti ayaṁ saddo yadā kriyāpaṭiggahaṇaṁ
anya-e0803n12:247_4: paṭicca sampadānatthe pavattati, tadā ‘‘aggassa ratanattayassa dātā’’ti atthavasena
anya-e0803n12:247_5: pavattati. Yadā pana kriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūte sāmiatthe pavattati, tadā ‘‘aggassa
anya-e0803n12:247_6: deyyadhammassa dātā’’ti atthavasena pavattati. Evaṁ sabbathāpi vipallāso tumhākaṁ
anya-e0803n12:247_7: saraṇaṁ na hotīti. Tathā saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘sampadānavacana’’nti tumhehi daḷhaṁ
anya-e0803n12:247_8: gahitassa mayhaṁsaddassa sāmiatthavasena paṇṇattiyaṁ dassanato vibhattivipallāso
anya-e0803n12:247_9: tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoteva. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n12:250_0: Ettha mayhakoti ekāya sakuṇajātiyā nāmaṁ. So hi loluppacāritāya ‘‘idampi mayhaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:250_1: idampi mayha’’nti kāyati ravatīti mayhakoti vuccati mayhasaddūpapadassa ke re ge
anya-e0803n12:251_0: Atrāyaṁ padasodhanā – yadi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddā dhuvaṁ sampadānatthe, tava mamasaddā
anya-e0803n12:251_1: ca sāmiatthe bhaveyyuṁ, evaṁ sante lokavohārakusalena sabbaññunā tassa sakuṇassa
anya-e0803n12:251_2: ‘‘mayhako’’ti paṇṇatti na vattabbā siyā anantogadhasampadānatthattā, antogadhasāmyatthattā
anya-e0803n12:251_3: pana ‘‘mamako’’ icceva paññatti vattabbā siyā. Etthapi ‘‘mayhako’’ti idaṁ vibhattivipallāsavasena
anya-e0803n12:251_4: vuttanti ce? Na, paṇṇattivisaye vibhattivipariṇāmassa aṭṭhānattā anavakāsattā.
anya-e0803n12:252_0: Apicettha mayhaṁsaddo sarūpato vibhatyantabhāvena tiṭṭhati kasaddena ekapadattūpagamanato,
anya-e0803n12:252_1: evaṁ santepi ‘‘mayhako’’ti ayaṁ sakuṇavisesavācako saddo paccattavacanabhāve ṭhitoyeva
anya-e0803n12:252_2: īsakaṁ sāmiatthampi jotayati sujampati rājapurisasaddā viya. Imināpi kāraṇena vibhattivipallāso
anya-e0803n12:252_3: tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoti. Iti ‘‘mayhako’’ti paṇṇattiyaṁ vattamānassa padāvayavabhūtassa
anya-e0803n12:252_4: mayhasaddassa avipallāsavacanalesena tuyhaṁ tava mamasaddesupi vibhattivipallāso
anya-e0803n12:252_5: na icchitabboti siddhaṁ. Tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena
anya-e0803n12:252_6: pavattānampi samānānaṁ tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ saddanayaññeva nissāya paresamanukampāya
anya-e0803n12:255: Evaṁ santepi etesaṁ, niyamo natthi pāḷiyaṁ;
anya-e0803n12:256: Koci tesaṁ viseso ca, diṭṭho amhehi taṁ suṇa.
anya-e0803n12:258: ‘‘Tuyhaṁ mayha’’ntime saddā, te payogā na dullabhā.
anya-e0803n12:260: Sampadāne yahiṁ honti, te payogā panappakā.
anya-e0803n12:263: Sabbāpi imā nītiyo paramasukhumā sududdasā vīrajātinā sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0803n12:264_1: ‘‘Kacci vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā’’tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati. ‘‘Gacchatha
anya-e0803n12:264_2: bhikkhave paṇāmemi vo’’tiādīsu upayoge. ‘‘Na vo mama santike vatthabba’’ntiādīsu
anya-e0803n12:264_4: vo sāriputtā subhāsita’’ntiādīsu sāmivacane. ‘‘Ye hi voariyā parisuddhā kāyakammantā’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n12:268_1: ca vattati. Ayañhi ‘‘gāmaṁ no gaccheyyāmā’’ti ettha paccatte dissati. ‘‘Mā no ajja
anya-e0803n12:268_2: vikantiṁsu, rañño sūdā mahānase’’tiādīsu upayoge. ‘‘Na no vivāho nāgehi, katapubbo
anya-e0803n12:268_4: no bhagavā anuppatto’’tiādīsu sāmivacane. ‘‘Na no samaṁ atthi tathāgatenā’’ti ettha
anya-e0803n12:268_5: avadhāraṇe. ‘‘Abhijānāsi no tvaṁ mahārājā’’tiādīsu nusaddatthe, pucchāyantipi vattuṁ
anya-e0803n12:268_6: vaṭṭati. ‘‘Subhāsitaññeva bhāseyya, no ca dubbhāsitaṁ bhaṇe’’tiādīsu paṭisedhe. ‘‘Na
anya-e0803n12:268_7: no sabhāyaṁ na karonti kiñcī’’tiādīsu nipātamatte. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n12:272: Idāni sabbanāmānaṁ yathārahaṁ saṁkhittena missakapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n12:273_0: Yo so, ye te. Yaṁ taṁ, ye te. Yena tena. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ. Yā sā, yā tā. Yaṁ
anya-e0803n12:273_1: taṁ, yā tā. Yāya tāya. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ. Yaṁ taṁ, yāni tāni. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:274_0: ‘‘Eso so, ete te. Ayaṁ so, ime te. So ayaṁ te ime’’tiādinā yathāpayogaṁ padamālā
anya-e0803n12:274_1: yojetabbā. Tathā hi ‘‘yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako. Ete te bhikkhave ubho ante
anya-e0803n12:274_2: anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā. Ayaṁ so sārathi etī’’ti evamādayo
anya-e0803n12:274_3: vicittappayogā dissanti. Iti sabbanāmikapadānaṁ missakapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:281: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
